situation.title: How to treat information
situation.meta_description: How to know that a source of information is trustworthy? What is fake news?

content.processed:
Recommendation

Track news from trusted sources.

How to know that a source of information is trustworthy?

  • Check the information from another source
  • The author of the texts is not anonymous
  • The text should not be emotionally influenced by the author
  • Know if it is an objective report or a subjective opinion 

Find out more in section Hoaxes.
